name: spotify-mcp-server
description: Control Spotify through natural language with AI assistants. Features include playback control, search, queue management, and music analytics.
author: kholcomb

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.title: Spotify Client ID
SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Spotify app client ID from developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization/app-settings/

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.title: Spotify Client Secret
SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Spotify app client secret from developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization/app-settings/

SPOTIFY_REDIRECT_URI.title: Spotify Redirect URI
SPOTIFY_REDIRECT_URI.description: OAuth callback URI - must match your Spotify app settings (default: http://localhost:6178/callback)
